DOC.detailed_description: Collection multiple subject create reference database .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects 18 year age old date inform consent 2 . Subjects able understand write informed consent willing participate evidence signing inform consent 3 . Subjects present site normal eye ( eye without pathology ) 4 . IOP â‰¤ 21 mmHg bilaterally 5 . BCVA 20/40 better ( eye ) 6 . Both eye must free eye disease 1 . Subjects unable tolerate ophthalmic imaging 2 . Subject ocular medium sufficiently clear obtain acceptable OCT image 3 . HFA visual field ( 242 Sita Standard , white white ) result abnormal , define GHT 'Outside Normal Limits ' and/or PSD < 5 % 4 . HFA visual field ( 242 Sita Standard , white white ) result unreliable ( base manufacturer 's recommendation ) , define fixation loss > 33 % false positives > 25 % , false negative > 25 % 5 . Presence ocular pathology except cataract 6 . Previous ocular surgery laser treatment , uncomplicated refractive procedure cataract surgery , perform within six month prior study scan 7 . Narrow angle 8 . History leukemia , dementia multiple sclerosis 9 . Concomitant use hydroxychloroquine chloroquine
